Characters

Blaster - Communications

  1. When you "put a cassette from the battlefield under it" does the mini-cassette heal to full or keep its damage/upgrades?
    All of the damage is removed, and the cassette is essentially healed to full. All upgrades attached to the cassette when itâ€™s moved under its deployer are scrapped.
  2. What is my build total for stars if I play both Soundwave - Communications, Blaster - Communications, and one Mini-Cassette. Do both "Your Starting Star Limit" abilities trigger?
    27 Stars. Both abilities would apply.
